amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the SEC to conduct a study to address anti-evasion concerns and determine if the term "held of record" should mean beneficial owner of the security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 112-409 to require the SEC to conduct a study to address anti-evasion concerns and determine if the term "held of record" should mean beneficial owner of the security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capuano amendment (A014) Failed by voice vote.
